Through our App, KattBNB provides an online marketplace that enables registered users (Users) who offer cat sitting services (Cat Sitters) to publish information about their services (Services) and directly communicate with Users that are looking to book such Services (Cat Owners). Cat Owners and Cat Sitters are collectively referred to as “you”, “your” or “Users”.

intro.p4: KattBNB can stop providing the App and terminate the use of it at any time without giving notice of termination to you. Unless we tell you otherwise, upon any termination, the rights and licenses granted to you in Terms will end.
intro.p5: KattBNB reserves the right to update Terms. In that case you will be notified via email to the email address you have provided on registration. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

registration.title: Registration
registration.p1: To register an account with the App the following applies:
registration.li1: You must be at least 18 years old.
registration.li2: You must not have been banned from handling and keeping animals by the authorities.
registration.li3: You must not have any criminal records relating to animal cruelty.
registration.p2: By registering you confirm that you have read and agree to Terms.
